articles.author: Sam McNeil, Jon Gambrell
articles.title: EU sanctions 15 Iranian officials, including top Revolutionary Guard leaders, over brutal crackdown - AP News
articles.description: The European Union has announced sanctions on 15 Iranian officials, including top commanders and officials of the paramilitary Revolutionary Guard, over Tehran’s deadly crackdown on nationwide protests. The sanctions announced Thursday also included measures …
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) The European Union sanctioned 15 Iranian officials Thursday over the countrys bloody crackdown on nationwide protests, including top commanders of its Revolutionary Guard, ahead of an e… [+7222 chars]
